amendment.description: To provide resources needed to study and review Native American language medium schools and programs.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2240 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 2240 proposed by Senator Murray for Senator Schatz to Amendment SA 2089. (consideration: CR S5098-5104; text: CR S5104) To provide resources needed to study and review Native American language medium schools and programs.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2240 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2240 proposed by Senator Murray for Senator Schatz to Amendment SA 2089.
